trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Macomb
There were no other sightings in Macomb on or around September 12th 2012
divs: sighting detailsjust got out of car, looked n saw a red pulsating object going from west to east started taking pictures, kept walking after it taking pictures lost it behind trees and houses. i believe it was a ufo, color was red no sound no blinking lights, it just pulsated red color and traveled slowly across sky. my feelings were i'm gonna get a picture so i kept walking taking pictures. i lost sight of it behind trees and houses. have 2 pictures that show object, but on phone\camera that sucks.
Summary: Was walking to front door, saw a red pulsating object traveling from NE to NW
